abstract.t: Intra-domain source address validation (SAV) plays an important role in defending against source address spoofing attacks in intra-domain networks. This document proposes an intra-domain source address validation (intra-domain SAVNET) architecture. Under the architecture, a router can automatically generate accurate SAV rules based on the SAV-related information from multiple information sources. This document does not specify protocols or protocol extensions, instead focusing on architectural components and their functionalities in an intra-domain SAVNET deployment.
